screeningSummary: Prank caller claiming blood came from walls - admits friends dared him to call

textVariants.text: You're on the air. What's happening at your place?
Alright, you're on. What's happening?
YOU ARE ON THE AIR! What's happening at your place?!
You're on. What's this about?
You're on. So?
Oh good, a caller! What's happening?!
You're on. State your experience concisely.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: Okay, so my house is haunted, Vern. Blood coming out of the walls last night! Actual blood! I tasted it to be sure!

textVariants.text: Blood from the walls. That's... dramatic. Have you had the plumbing checked?
Blood from the walls... alright, have you checked the plumbing?
BLOOD FROM THE WALLS?! This is INSANE! Plumbing checked?!
Blood from the walls. Of course it was. Plumbing checked?
Blood from the walls. Have you checked the plumbing?
BLOOD FROM THE WALLS! This is AMAZING! Did you check the PLUMBING?!
Liquid emergence from wall structures. Have you consulted plumbing professionals to rule out mundane explanations?

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: It's not rust! It's actual blood! Old blood, you know? Like the house is bleeding from old wounds!

textVariants.text: Old wounds. The house is bleeding from old wounds.
Old wounds... the house is bleeding. Right.
THE HOUSE IS BLEEDING FROM OLD WOUNDS! This is TERRIFYING!
The house is bleeding from old wounds. Of course it is.
The house is bleeding. Okay.
THE HOUSE IS BLEEDING FROM OLD WOUNDS! This is PERFECT radio!
Anthropomorphized structural hemorrhage. Fascinating hypothesis.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: I know how it sounds! But wait, there's more! Objects have been flying everywhere! My cat flew across the room!

textVariants.text: You tasted mystery liquid from your wall and your cat jumped. That's two natural explanations. Next caller.
Tasted the wall and your cat jumped. Next.
TASTED THE WALL and your CAT JUMPED! This is the BEST call of the night!
You tasted the wall and your cat jumped. Next caller.
Tasted wall, cat jumped. Next.
TASTED THE WALL and the CAT FLEW! This is WHY I love this show! NEXT!
Wall liquid consumption and feline locomotion. Two mundane explanations identified. Next caller.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: *snickering* Okay yeah, I was just messing around. My friends dared me to call. Great show though, Vern!

arcNotes: Obvious prank, dramatic claims, self-aware humor, cat jumping as 'flying'
